event.description: Alfonso Soriano grounds out, shortstop J. Hardy to first baseman Prince Fielder.
Aaron Miles called out on strikes.
Kosuke Fukudome triples (1) on a line drive to right fielder Corey Hart.
Milton Bradley flies out to center fielder Mike Cameron.
Micah Hoffpauir singles on a sharp ground ball to right fielder Corey Hart.
Geovany Soto grounds into a double play, third baseman Bill Hall to second baseman Rickie Weeks to first baseman Prince Fielder. Micah Hoffpauir out at 2nd.
Mike Fontenot grounds out, second baseman Rickie Weeks to first baseman Prince Fielder.
Bobby Scales singles on a ground ball to center fielder Mike Cameron.
Sean Marshall out on a sacrifice bunt, catcher Jason Kendall to second baseman Rickie Weeks. Bobby Scales to 2nd.
Alfonso Soriano homers (10) on a fly ball to center field. Bobby Scales scores.
Aaron Miles doubles (5) on a line drive to right fielder Corey Hart.
Kosuke Fukudome singles on a line drive to right fielder Corey Hart. Aaron Miles to 3rd.
Milton Bradley singles on a sharp ground ball to center fielder Mike Cameron. Aaron Miles scores. Kosuke Fukudome to 3rd.
With Micah Hoffpauir batting, wild pitch by Jeff Suppan, Kosuke Fukudome scores. Milton Bradley to 2nd. Throwing error by catcher Jason Kendall.
Micah Hoffpauir grounds out to first baseman Prince Fielder. Milton Bradley to 3rd.
Geovany Soto walks.
Mike Fontenot strikes out on a foul tip.
Bobby Scales pops out to shortstop J. Hardy.
Sean Marshall grounds out, third baseman Bill Hall to first baseman Prince Fielder.
Alfonso Soriano pops out to shortstop J. Hardy.
Aaron Miles lines out to center fielder Mike Cameron.
Kosuke Fukudome walks.
Milton Bradley grounds into a force out, second baseman Rickie Weeks to shortstop J. Hardy. Kosuke Fukudome out at 2nd. Milton Bradley to 1st.
Micah Hoffpauir grounds out, second baseman Rickie Weeks to first baseman Prince Fielder.
Geovany Soto strikes out swinging.
Mike Fontenot grounds out, second baseman Rickie Weeks to first baseman Prince Fielder.
Bobby Scales singles on a line drive to left fielder Ryan Braun.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Ryan Theriot replaces Sean Marshall.
Ryan Theriot grounds into a force out, third baseman Bill Hall to second baseman Rickie Weeks. Bobby Scales out at 2nd.
Pitching Change: Carlos Villanueva replaces Jeff Suppan, batting 9th.
Alfonso Soriano flies out to left fielder Ryan Braun.
Aaron Miles flies out to right fielder Corey Hart.
Kosuke Fukudome strikes out swinging.
Pitching Change: Mark DiFelice replaces Carlos Villanueva, batting 9th, replacing Chris Duffy.
Milton Bradley called out on strikes.
Micah Hoffpauir pops out to catcher Jason Kendall in foul territory.
Geovany Soto flies out to center fielder Mike Cameron.
Mike Fontenot lines out to right fielder Corey Hart.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Ryan Freel replaces Carlos Marmol.
Ryan Freel singles on a ground ball to center fielder Mike Cameron.
Ryan Theriot strikes out swinging.
Alfonso Soriano reaches on a throwing error by third baseman Bill Hall. Ryan Freel to 2nd.
With Aaron Miles batting, Jason Kendall picks off Ryan Freel at 2nd on throw to J. Hardy.
Rickie Weeks homers (7) on a line drive to left field.
Corey Hart grounds out, shortstop Aaron Miles to first baseman Micah Hoffpauir.
Ryan Braun walks.
Prince Fielder pops out to shortstop Aaron Miles.
Mike Cameron doubles (11) on a fly ball to left fielder Alfonso Soriano. Ryan Braun to 3rd.
J. Hardy strikes out on a foul tip.
Bill Hall doubles (8) on a fly ball to left fielder Alfonso Soriano.
Jason Kendall triples (1) on a fly ball to left fielder Alfonso Soriano. Bill Hall scores.
Jeff Suppan grounds out sharply, third baseman Mike Fontenot to first baseman Micah Hoffpauir.
Rickie Weeks walks.
Corey Hart lines out to shortstop Aaron Miles.
Ryan Braun strikes out swinging.
Prince Fielder grounds out, first baseman Micah Hoffpauir to pitcher Sean Marshall.
Mike Cameron walks.
J. Hardy grounds into a force out, second baseman Bobby Scales to shortstop Aaron Miles. Mike Cameron out at 2nd. J. Hardy to 1st.
Bill Hall singles on a sharp ground ball to center fielder Kosuke Fukudome. J. Hardy to 2nd.
Jason Kendall grounds out, second baseman Bobby Scales to first baseman Micah Hoffpauir.
Jeff Suppan lines out to left fielder Alfonso Soriano.
Rickie Weeks pops out to first baseman Micah Hoffpauir in foul territory.
Corey Hart called out on strikes.
Ryan Braun grounds out, third baseman Mike Fontenot to first baseman Micah Hoffpauir.
Prince Fielder called out on strikes.
Mike Cameron flies out to right fielder Milton Bradley.
Defensive switch from shortstop to second base for Aaron Miles.
Pitching Change: Angel Guzman replaces Sean Marshall, batting 8th, replacing second baseman Bobby Scales.
Ryan Theriot remains in the game as the shortstop.
J. Hardy grounds out, shortstop Ryan Theriot to first baseman Micah Hoffpauir.
Bill Hall flies out to right fielder Milton Bradley.
Jason Kendall strikes out swinging.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Chris Duffy replaces Carlos Villanueva.
Chris Duffy strikes out swinging.
Rickie Weeks grounds out, shortstop Ryan Theriot to first baseman Micah Hoffpauir.
Corey Hart grounds out, third baseman Mike Fontenot to first baseman Micah Hoffpauir.
Pitching Change: Carlos Marmol replaces Angel Guzman, batting 8th.
Ryan Braun doubles (7) on a line drive to right fielder Milton Bradley.
With Prince Fielder batting, Ryan Braun advances to 3rd on a balk.
Prince Fielder strikes out swinging.
Mike Cameron walks.
With J. Hardy batting, wild pitch by Carlos Marmol, Mike Cameron to 2nd.
J. Hardy pops out to second baseman Aaron Miles.
Bill Hall walks.
Jason Kendall grounds into a force out, third baseman Mike Fontenot to second baseman Aaron Miles. Bill Hall out at 2nd.
Pitching Change: Kevin Gregg replaces Carlos Marmol, batting 8th, replacing Ryan Freel.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Craig Counsell replaces Mark DiFelice.
Craig Counsell flies out softly to center fielder Kosuke Fukudome.
Rickie Weeks walks.
Corey Hart strikes out swinging.
With Ryan Braun batting, Rickie Weeks advances to 2nd on defensive indifference.
Ryan Braun strikes out swinging.
